ValidationRule.description: Validate that for a Parking product all Minute fields are set to activate the record
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( IsActive, ISPICKVAL(Product2.Family, "Parking"), OR( ISBLANK(COMM_First15MinuteUnit__c), ISBLANK(COMM_Second15MinuteUnit__c), ISBLANK(COMM_Third15MinuteUnit__c), ISBLANK(COMM_Remaining15MinuteUnit__c) ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: To set as active, all Minute fields are Required for a Parking product
